Package src.interfaces

Interface ConcentrationSiteInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcentrationSite
    public interface ConcentrationSiteInterface
    Concentration Site where ordinary thieves wait for orders

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean amINeeded()
      Called by an ordinary thief to wait for orders
      boolean contains​(OrdinaryThief thief)
      Returns true if an Ordinary Thief is in the Concentration Site
      void prepareAssaultParty​(AssaultPartyInterface assaultParty, int room)
      Called by the master thief, when enough ordinary thieves are available and there is still a room with paintings - Synchronization point between Master Thief and every Ordinary Thief constituting the Assault Party
      int prepareExcursion()
      Ordinary Thief waits for the Master Thief to dispatch the designed Assault Party
      void sumUpResults​(int paintings)
      The Master Thief announces the end of operations and shares the number of paintings acquired in the heist

    • Method Detail

      • prepareAssaultParty

        void prepareAssaultParty​(AssaultPartyInterface assaultParty,
                         int room)
        Called by the master thief, when enough ordinary thieves are available and there is still a room with paintings - Synchronization point between Master Thief and every Ordinary Thief constituting the Assault Party
        Parameters:
        assaultParty - the Assault Party
        room - number of the room in the museum

      • sumUpResults

        void sumUpResults​(int paintings)
        The Master Thief announces the end of operations and shares the number of paintings acquired in the heist
        Parameters:
        paintings - the number of paintings

      • amINeeded

        boolean amINeeded()
        Called by an ordinary thief to wait for orders
        Returns:
        true if needed, false otherwise

      • prepareExcursion

        int prepareExcursion()
        Ordinary Thief waits for the Master Thief to dispatch the designed Assault Party
        Returns:
        the Assault Party identification

      • contains

        boolean contains​(OrdinaryThief thief)
        Returns true if an Ordinary Thief is in the Concentration Site
        Parameters:
        thief - the Ordinary Thief
        Returns:
        true if the thief is in the Concentration Site, false otherwise
